ability.name: Orb of Deception
ability.description: Ahri fires an orb in a line, dealing magic damage to all enemies it passes through on the way out, and true damage on the way back.

ability.name: Galaxy Shield-Blast
ability.description: Annie blasts a cone of fire dealing magic damage to enemies in front of her, then creates a shield for herself for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
ability.description: Ashe fires and arrow toward the farthest enemy, colliding with the first enemy hit, dealing damage and stunning them. The stun lasts longer the farther the arrow travels.

ability.name: Mobilise the Fleet
ability.description: Aurelion Sol launches fighters, which fly out to random enemies and blast them, dealing magic damage and draining mana, then return. The first time he casts, Aurelion Sol launches 4 fighters. Subsequent casts launch all returned fighters, plus 2 additional.

ability.name: Traveller's Call
ability.description: Bard gains an additional mana each attack. Bard launches a meep onto his owner's bench which can be sold for 1 XP.

ability.name: Rocket Grab
ability.description: Blitzcrank pulls the furthest enemy to him, dealing magic damage and stunning them for 2.5 seconds. The next attack after pulling knocks up for 1 second. Allies within range will prioritize attacking Blitzcrank's target.

ability.name: Ace in the Hole
ability.description: Caitlyn takes aim at the farthest enemy, firing a deadly bullet towards them that deals magic damage to the first enemy it hits.

ability.name: Noxious Blast
ability.description: Cassiopeia launches her fangs at the nearest enemy that isn't poisoned, causing them to take damage over 14 seconds, and reducing the effectiveness of shields used on them by 50%.

ability.name: Dreadnova Guillotine
ability.description: Darius dunks an enemy, dealing magic damage. If this kills the target, Darius immediately casts again. Targets below 50% health take double damage.

ability.name: Chronobreak
ability.description: Ekko shatters the timeline, freezing all units in time before attacking each enemy with bonus magic damage and applying on-hit effects. Slows the attack speed of all enemies hit by 50% for 7 seconds.

ability.name: E.M.P
ability.description: Ezreal fires electromagnetic pulse at a random enemy that explodes on impact, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies and increases the cost of their next spell cast by 40%.

ability.name: Riposte
ability.description: Fiora enters a defensive stance for 1.5 seconds, becoming immune to damage and enemy spell effects. As she exits this stance, she ripostes, dealing magic damage and stunning them for a second.

ability.name: Chum the Waters
ability.description: Fizz throws a lure that attracts a shark, causing it to emerge after a brief delay. It deals magic damage to enemies caught, knocking them back and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

ability.name: Orbital Strike
ability.description: Gangplank calls down an orbital strike around his target, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a large area for 2 seconds.

ability.name: GNAR!
ability.description: Gnar leaps towards his target and transforms into Mega Gnar, throwing nearby enemies, dealing 200 damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. While in Mega Gnar form, Gnar gains 750 Health and 100 Attack Damage and becomes melee.

ability.name: Smoke Grenade
ability.description: Graves launches a smoke grenade toward the highest attack speed enemy, which explodes on impact dealing magic damage to enemies in the area and causing their attacks to miss for a second.

ability.name: Tentacle Smash
ability.description: Illaoi slams a tentacle in a line in front of her, dealing 125 damage and stealing Armor and Magic Resist from each target hit for 6 seconds.

ability.name: Bladesurge
ability.description: Irelia dashes past her target, attacking them for a percentage of her Attack Damage as she passes through. If this kills the target, she casts again immediately at the enemy with the highest mana.

ability.name: Howling Gale
ability.description: Janna summons five tornadoes which fly forward in a large cone. Tornadoes grant allies they pass through 100% attack speed for 5 seconds, while knocking up and stunning enemies for 1.5 seconds.

ability.name: Ageless Standard
ability.description: Jarvan calls down his standard to a nearby location, granting nearby allies Attack Speed for 6 seconds.

ability.name: To the Skies
ability.description: Jayce jumps into the air and slams his hammer, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

ability.name: Whisper
ability.description: Jhin converts each 1% of bonus attack speed he has into 0.8 attack damage. Every fourth shot, Jhin deals bonus % attack damage.

ability.name: Get Excited!
ability.description: Jinx gets excited as she helps take down enemy units! After her first takedown, Jinx gains bonus attack speed. After her second takedown, Jinx swaps to her rocket launcher, causing her basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage to all enemies in a small area around her target.

ability.name: Inspire
ability.description: At the start of combat, Karma bonds to her closest ally. Karma grants the bonded ally (or a random one if that ally is dead) a health shield for 4 seconds. While the shield holds, the ally receives bonus Attack Speed.

ability.name: Barrage
ability.description: For 3 seconds Kog'Maw gains infinite Attack Range, 80% Attack Speed, and his attacks deal 2% of the target's maximum health as magic damage.

ability.name: Cyber Barrier
ability.description: Leona creates a barrier, reducing all incoming damage for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Relentless Pursuit
ability.description: Lucian dashes away from his current target, then basic attacks them and fires a second shot which deals magic damage.

ability.name: Massive Polymorph
ability.description: Lulu polymorphs the 2 nearest enemies, causing them to hop aimlessly, unable to attack or cast. Polymorphed enemies take additional damage from all sources.

ability.name: Energy Shield
ability.description: Malphite starts combat with a shield equal to a percent of his maximum health.

ability.name: Chosen One
ability.description: For 5 seconds, Master Yi gains massively increased movement speed, heals for a percentage of his maximum health each second, and deals bonus true damage with his basic attacks.

ability.name: Indestructible
ability.description: Mordekaiser gains a shield that absorbs damage over 8 seconds. While the shield persists, Mordekaiser deals magic damage per second to all nearby enemies.

ability.name: Impact Crater
ability.description: Nautilus erupts the ground beneath his target, knocking them up and stunning them, and dealing magic damage. Enemies adjacent to the target receive half of this effect.

ability.name: Pop Blossom
ability.description: Neeko leaps into the air and slams into the ground, dealing magic damage and stunning all nearby enemies.

ability.name: Pop Unspeakable Horror
ability.description: Nocturne terrifies his target, causing them to be stunned with fear and dealing damage over the duration.

ability.name: Buckler Toss
ability.description: Poppy throws her buckler at the furthest enemy dealing damage. The buckler bounces back to Poppy, shielding her.

ability.name: Grand Entrance
ability.description: Rakan dashes to the furthest enemy within range and leaps into the air, knocking up and dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies.

ability.name: Energy Slash
ability.description: Riven dashes and shields herself, then slashes forward dealing magic damage. Every third cast, Riven leaps into the air and launches a wave of energy that deals magic damage.

ability.name: Flamespitter
ability.description: Rumble torches his enemies, dealing magic damage in a cone over 3 seconds, and reducing healing on them by 50% for 5 seconds.

ability.name: Deceive
ability.description: Shaco teleports and backstabs his target, critically striking for a percentage of his basic attack damage.

ability.name: Future's Refuge
ability.description: Shen creates a zone around himself for a few seconds, granting all nearby allies 100% chance to dodge incoming basic attacks. While active, Shen gains Magic Resist.

ability.name: Wish
ability.description: Soraka heals all allies.

ability.name: Unleashed Power
ability.description: Syndra pulls in all orbs on the battlefield and creates 3 new ones, then fires them all at the enemy with the highest health, dealing magic damage per orb.

ability.name: Satellite Traps
ability.description: Teemo scatters three traps around the nearest enemy. When an enemy nears a trap (or after 3 seconds), it explodes on nearby enemies dealing magic damage, knocking them down, and slowing them for 3 seconds.

ability.name: Temporal Passage
ability.description: Thresh tosses his lantern towards a random unit(s) on your bench, pulling them into the current combat and granting them and himself bonus mana. Traits are unaffected.

ability.name: Wild Cards
ability.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards in a cone that deal magic damage to each enemy they pass through.

ability.name: Fear Beyond Death
ability.description: Urgot fires a drill at the farthest enemy, reeling the first enemy hit in and dealing true damage repeatedly until they die when they reach him and reducing his mana cost.

ability.name: Final Hour
ability.description: Vayne focuses for 10 seconds, tumbling away from her target immediately and every third attack thereafter. Vayne is invisible while tumbling, and attacks after tumbling deal bonus damage.

ability.name: Assault and Battery
ability.description: Vi charges at the farthest enemy, knocking aside and dealing magic damage to all enemies along the way. When she reaches her target, she deals magic damage and knocks them up.

ability.name: Death Ray
ability.description: Viktor burns a path between the two enemies most distant from one another, initially dealing a percentage of max health damage, then 1 second later dealing damage in an explosion along the same path.

ability.name: Cyclone
ability.description: Wukong spins rapidly around, dealing magic damage to nearby units over 3 seconds. The first time Wukong hits each enemy, he knocks them into the air and stuns them.

ability.name: Deadly Plumage
ability.description: Xayah creates a storm of blades, gaining Attack Speed for a few seconds.

ability.name: Abyssal Bombardment
ability.description: Xerath transforms, summoning meteors to strike random foes in place of his normal attacks. Meteors deal magic damage upon impact and if they kill their target, all adjacent enemies take magic damage and are stunned for 1.5 seconds.

ability.name: Three Talon Strike
ability.description: Xin Zhao quickly strikes his target three times, dealing Basic Attack damage and applying on-hit effects. The third strike deals bonus magic damage and knocks his target up for 1.5 seconds.

ability.name: Last Breath
ability.description: Yasuo blinks to the farthest enemy within range and knocks them up, holding them airborne for 1 second and hitting them multiple times, dealing Basic Attack damage and applying on-hit effects.

ability.name: Contempt for the Weak
ability.description: Every third attack, Zed deals bonus magic damage and steals a percentage of the target's current Attack Damage.

ability.name: Bomb!
ability.description: Ziggs throws a bomb at an enemy, dealing magic damage.

ability.name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble
ability.description: Zoe kicks a bubble at the enemy with the highest health, dealing magic damage and stunning them.

ability.name: Infernal Chains
ability.description: Aatrox pulls some of the farthest enemies toward himself, then slams the ground in front of himself, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit.

ability.name: Five Point Strike
ability.description: Akali throws kunai at her target, dealing magic damage.

ability.name: Burst Shield
ability.description: Annie blasts a cone of fire, dealing magic damage to enemies in front of her, then creates a shield on herself for 8 seconds.

ability.name: Voice of Lightning
ability.description: Aurelion Sol breathes lightning in a line towards the farthest enemy, dealing magic damage and Overcharging all enemies hit for 10 seconds. If an enemy is already Overcharged, Aurelion Sol consumes the effect and deals 50% bonus damage.

ability.name: Emperor's Divide
ability.description: Azir calls forth a wall of charging soldiers from behind him, dealing magic damage to and slowing all enemies hit for 3 seconds. Enemies close to Azir are knocked back, while enemies further away are knocked up for 1.5 seconds.

ability.name: Dragonfire Pillar
ability.description: After a brief delay, Brand erupts the ground under the enemy with the highest current Health to erupt in flames, dealing magic damage to enemies within. If an enemy is caught in the epicenter, they are stunned for a few seconds.

ability.name: Unbreakable
ability.description: Braum puts up his shield for 4 seconds, reducing his damage taken from that direction.

ability.name: Rupture
ability.description: Cho'Gath ruptures a large area, dealing magic damage and knocking up all enemies within for a few seconds. Set4_Fabled Bonus: Cho'Gath additionally knocks up all enemies on the board.

ability.name: Fortune's Guillotine
ability.description: Darius dunks an enemy, dealing magic damage. While dunking, Darius is unstoppable. If this kills the target, Darius immediately casts again dealing 25% reduced damage.

ability.name: Pale Cascade
ability.description: Diana shields herself against damage over 4 seconds and summons some orbs to orbit around her. These orbs explode for magic damage when they hit an enemy, refreshing her Shield the final one explodes.

ability.name: Spider Form
ability.description: Elise transforms into a spider, gaining bonus Health. Elise's attacks in Spider Form heal her and inject her target with venom, increasing the cost of their next spell.

ability.name: Riposte
ability.description: Fiora enters a defensive stance for a few seconds, becoming immune to damage and enemy spell effects. Afterwards, she strikes, dealing magic damage to a nearby enemy and stunning them for a few seconds.

ability.name: Judgement
ability.description: Garen spins his sword for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and reducing incoming magic damage by 80% over the duration.

ability.name: Bladestorm
ability.description: Irelia launches a storm of blades in front of her, dealing magic damage and disarming enemies for a few seconds.

ability.name: Eye of the Storm
ability.description: Janna shields her some lowest-Health allies for 4 seconds. Shielded allies also gain Attack Damage for the duration.

ability.name: Dragon Strike
ability.description: Jarvan IV throws his standard near the farthest enemy and pulls himself towards it with his lance, dealing magic damage to enemies he passes through, knocking them up and stunning them for 1 second.

ability.name: Counter Strike
ability.description: Jax dodges all incoming attacks for 2 seconds, then strikes all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

ability.name: Rend
ability.description: Kalista's spears remain in her target, each one capable of dealing % of the target's maximum Health in magic damage when removed. She removes the spears when doing so would kill the target.

ability.name: Death Lotus
ability.description: Katarina channels for 2.5 seconds, throwing knives at nearby enemies, dealing magic damage over the duration and reducing healing by 50% to her targets for 5 seconds.

ability.name: Divine Ascension
ability.description: Kayle Ascends, causing her attacks to launch waves that deal bonus magic damage.

ability.name: Slicing Maelstrom
ability.description: Kennen summons a storm around himself for 3 seconds, calling down lightning bolts on all enemies in the area every 0.5 second and dealing magic damage over the duration. Each enemy struck by 3 lightning bolts is stunned for 1.5 seconds.

ability.name: Dance of Dread
ability.description: Wolf mauls Kindred's target, dealing magic damage and reducing their healing by 50% for 5 seconds. Meanwhile, Lamb leaps away from Kindred's target.

ability.name: God Fist
ability.description: Lee Sin punches his target, dealing magic damage, knocking them back to the edge of the battlefield, and stunning them for a few seconds. Any enemies the target collides with during the knockback receive half the damage and are stunned for 1 second. If the target cannot be pushed back any further, they are knocked out of the battlefield instead, removing them from combat. If the target is still alive after being punched, Lee Sin will dash to them.

ability.name: Wild Growth
ability.description: Lulu makes a low-Health ally giant, knocking up nearby enemies for 1 second. Giant allies gain bonus Health for the rest of combat.

ability.name: Bramble Smash
ability.description: Maokai smashes the ground, sending forward a shockwave, that deals magic damage to enemies hit and slowing their Attack Speed by 50% for 3 seconds.

ability.name: Hallowed Ground
ability.description: Morgana hallows the ground beneath a random enemy, dealing magic damage to enemies over 5 seconds, shredding their Attack Damage.

ability.name: Wither
ability.description: Nasus withers the enemy with the highest percent Health, dealing magic damage over 5 seconds, and slowing their Attack Speed and Movement Speed by 50% for the duration.

ability.name: Impact Crater
ability.description: Nautilus erupts the ground beneath his target, knocking them up, stunning them for a few seconds and dealing magic damage. Set4_Fabled Bonus: Nautilus also grants himself a shield that reduces incoming damage by 60% for 5 seconds.

ability.name: Pop Blossom
ability.description: Neeko throws a seed at a random target that explodes for magic damage three times. Each explosion affects a bigger area than the last. Set4_Fabled Bonus: The third explosion is empowered dealing 300 magic damage instead.

ability.name: Javelin Toss
ability.description: Nidalee throws her javelin at her farthest enemy, dealing magic damage plus 20% more for each hex traveled.

ability.name: Consume
ability.description: Willump bites his target, dealing magic damage. If Willump's target has less Health than he does before the bite, it deals an additional 50% damage and becomes true damage.

ability.name: Ragnarok
ability.description: Olaf gains Attack Speed, immunity to crowd control, and his attacks cleave in a cone in front of him for physical damage for the rest of combat.

ability.name: Stampede
ability.description: Ornn summons an elemental from behind the farthest enemy to travel towards him, slowing the Attack Speed of enemies hit by 50% for a few seconds and dealing magic damage. If the elemental runs into Ornn, he headbutts it, redirecting it towards another distant enemy, stunning for 1.5 seconds and dealing magic Damage.

ability.name: Phantom Undertow
ability.description: Pyke leaves a phantom at his location, then dashes behind the farthest enemy. After 1 second, his phantom returns to Pyke, dealing magic damage to all enemies it passes through and stunning them for a few seconds.

ability.name: Disarming Diversion
ability.description: Rakan dashes to the furthest enemy within range, disarming all units he passes through for a few seconds and taunting his target. Rakan then creates a shield on himself for 4 seconds

ability.name: Inferno Trigger
ability.description: Samira dashes and becomes unstoppable, unleashing a few shots per second at 3 enemies within 2.5 hexes for 2 seconds. Each shot does % of her Attack Damage. For the duration, Samira gains 100% dodge chance.

ability.name: Firecracker
ability.description: Sejuani throws a giant firecracker at the closest enemy that explodes after a 2-second delay. Enemies in the explosion are dealt magic damage and are stunned for a few seconds.

ability.name: Showstopper
ability.description: Sett grabs his target and slams them forward, dealing % of their maximum Health in magic damage to them, and % of the slammed enemy's maximum Health to all other enemies in a large area.

ability.name: Shadow Dash
ability.description: Shen dashes past his target, shielding himself against damage and taunting all adjacent enemies for a seconds.

ability.name: Dragon's Descent
ability.description: Shyvana dashes away from her current target and transforms into dragon form. While in Dragon Form, Shyvana gains bonus Health, bonus AD, and her Basic Attacks become ranged attacks that deal bonus magic damage over 2 seconds on hit.

ability.name: On the Hunt
ability.description: Sivir rallies her allies within 2 hexes, granting them Attack Speed for 5 seconds. Sivir gains bonus Attack Damage for the duration.

ability.name: Draconic Ascension
ability.description: Swain transforms into his dragon form for 6 seconds, gaining maximum Health and dealing magic damage each second to enemies within a few hexes. While in dragon form, every 2 seconds Swain breaths fire in a cone in front of him, dealing magic damage, burning enemies for 25% of their maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration.

ability.name: Thick Skin
ability.description: Tahm Kench takes reduced damage from all sources.

ability.name: Truestrike
ability.description: Talon stabs his target, striking them for % of his Attack Damage plus bonus physical damage. If this kills them, Talon becomes unstoppable, and untargetable while he leaps to the lowest Armor enemy.

ability.name: Sporecloud Dart
ability.description: Teemo fires a dart at the enemy with the highest Attack Speed. The dart explodes into a cloud of spores on contact, poisoning nearby enemies. Poisoned enemies take magic damage over a few seconds and are blinded for the duration.

ability.name: Rapid Fire
ability.description: Tristana excites her Dragon, increasing her Attack Speed and dealing bonus magic damage on hit for 3 seconds.

ability.name: Spinning Slash
ability.description: Tryndamere spins in a line towards the most enemies, dealing % of his Attack Damage to enemies in his path and empowering his next three auto attacks to deal more damage.

ability.name: Wild Cards
ability.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards in a cone that deal magic damage to each enemy they pass through.

ability.name: Dark Blossom
ability.description: Veigar blasts the enemy with the lowest Health, dealing magic damage. If this kills his target, Veigar permanently gains spell power.

ability.name: Denting Blow
ability.description: Vi's attack blasts through her target, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a cone and reducing their Armor for 8 seconds.

ability.name: Transfusion
ability.description: Vladimir deals magic damage to his target. All nearby allies are healed for 50% of damage dealt.

ability.name: Crushing Blow
ability.description: Wukong slams his target with his staff, dealing % of his Attack Damage as physical damage and stunning them for a few seconds.

ability.name: Featherstorm
ability.description: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable, invulnerable, and throwing out a fan of feather daggers, dealing % of her Attack Damage as physical damage to enemies within the cone. Xayah then recalls her feathers, striking enemies hit for magic damage per feather.

ability.name: Striking Steel
ability.description: Yasuo strikes forward two hexes, attacking for % of his Attack Damage. If he can't hit two targets from where he's standing, he'll first dash to a place where he can.

ability.name: Seal Fate
ability.description: Yone strikes along a path in front of him, dealing magic damage split between all enemies hit. Enemies hit are marked for death, reducing their Armor and Magic Resist. Yone's spell is then replaced with Unforgotten until there are no remaining enemies marked for death. Unforgotten (20 mana): Yone dashes to the lowest-Health enemy that is marked for death, dealing physical damage plus their missing health as magic damage.

ability.name: Zoomies
ability.description: Yuumi dashes to the lowest-Health ally, healing them for % of their missing Health and granting them Attack Speed for 5 seconds. She then repeats this on the farthest ally.

ability.name: Contempt for the Weak
ability.description: Innate: When combat starts, Zed teleports to the enemy backline. Every third attack, Zed deals bonus magic damage and steals % of the target's current Attack Damage.

ability.name: Rewind Fate
ability.description: Zilean places a protective Time Rune on the allies with the lowest Health other than himself. When they would die, they instead resurrect after a few seconds, returning to combat with some Health and shedding all negative effects. After resurrecting, they have bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

ability.name: Deathbringer Strike
ability.description: Aatrox strikes his target, dealing a percentage of his Attack Damage, and heals himself.

ability.name: Dark Vigil
ability.description: Aphelios launches attacks simultaneously, one at his target and the rest at the enemies nearest to them, dealing a percentage of his Attack Damage plus bonus physical damage to each.

ability.name: Enchanted Arrow
ability.description: Ashe fires an arrow at the farthest enemy, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and stunning them. If the arrow travels at least 5 hexes, the stun duration is doubled. Enemies within 1 hex receive 50% of these effects.
Brand launches a ball of fire at the nearest non-seared enemy, searing them for magic damage over 12 seconds. Seared enemies have reduced Magic Resist.
ability.name: Sear
God-Wolf's Carnage
ability.description: Darius transforms into a God-Wolf, becoming unstoppable as he lunges towards a nearby enemy. God-Wolves join him in his hunt, each targeting their own prey. When God-Wolves bite enemies, they deal a percentage of Darius' Attack Damage as physical damage, and reduce the enemy's armour by 70% for 10 seconds. When Darius bites his prey, his next several attacks restore 10% of his maximum Health.

ability.name: Moonfall
ability.description: Diana calls forth moonlight, drawing in all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage and stunning them for several seconds.

ability.name: Spinning Axes
ability.description: Draven starts spinning an axe, empowering his next attack to deal a percentage of his Attack Damage plus @ModifiedDamage@ bonus physical damage. It will return to his original location after striking the target. If Draven catches it, he will empower the axe again. Draven can spin up to 2 axes at a time.

ability.name: God-Lion's Justice
ability.description: Garen calls down a sword that strikes a large area around his target, dealing a percentage of each target's max Health in magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 70% for 10 seconds. Garen gains a shield equal to a percentage of his maximum Health for 5 seconds.

ability.name: Drunken Rage
ability.description: Gragas drinks from his cask, granting him percentage damage reduction for 4 seconds, and causing his next attack to deal bonus magic damage.

ability.name: Spirit of Dread
ability.description: Hecarim creates an aura around himself for 3 seconds. Each enemy within the aura takes magic damage and heals Hecarim over the duration.

ability.name: Upgrade!!!
ability.description: Heimerdinger empowers his Baby Dragon's next attack. The Baby Dragon's overcharged attack launches 3 fireballs across the battlefield, dealing magic damage and burning enemies for 18% of their maximum Health as true damage over 6 seconds, reducing healing by 50% for the duration. If Heimerdinger does not have a Baby Dragon, this Ability will create one instead.

ability.name: Daisy!
ability.description: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Daisy receives 100% of Ivern's Ability Power and immediately casts Shockwave upon arrival.If Daisy is already in battle, Ivern increases her Ability Power by and commands her to cast Shockwave again.

ability.name: Empowered Strike
ability.description: Jax slams his target for a percentage of his Attack Damage and gains stacking Attack Speed for the remainder of combat. Jax leaps to the nearest enemy if no target is in his Attack Range.

ability.name: Pierce
ability.description: Kalista hurls a spear towards the farthest enemy, dealing a percentage of her Attack Damage plus bonus physical damage to the first enemy it hits. If it kills an enemy, the spear continues and will deal any excess damage to the next enemy it hits.

ability.name: Soulflare
ability.description: Karma fires a burst of energy towards a random enemy's location that detonates upon impact, dealing magic damage to adjacent enemies, and reducing Karma's maximum Mana (down to a minimum of 10). Karma empowers every third cast, causing it to launch 3 bursts of energy toward different targets instead of 1.

ability.name: Sinister Blade
ability.description: Katarina throws a dagger at the farthest enemy, dealing magic damage. When the dagger lands near the target Katarina teleports to it and immediately launches 3 additional daggers at the nearest enemies that each deal magic damage. Enemies hit have their incoming healing reduced by 50% for 6 seconds.

ability.name: Divine Ascent
ability.description:
Kayle ascends every few seconds. Each bonus stacks with the one before, until she is fully ascended.

 1st: Attacks deal a percentage of Kayle's Attack Damage as bonus true damage.
 2nd: Attacks explode around the target dealing her Attack Damage and bonus true damage to adjacent enemies.
 3rd: Every 7th attack grants Kayle immunity to damage for 1 second.
 4th: Attacks cause swords to rain down around the target, dealing magic damage.

ability.name: Flame Rush
ability.description: Kennen engulfs himself in flame, dashing behind his target, then to the farthest enemy. Enemies he passes through are zapped dealing magic damage and stunning them for several seconds.

ability.name: Taste their Fear
ability.description: Kha'Zix slashes the nearest enemy, dealing magic damage. If the enemy has no adjacent allies, this damage is increased.

ability.name: Lamb's Respite
ability.description: Lamb creates a zone around herself for several seconds that prevents allies within from falling below a certain amount of Health or dying. While Lamb's Respite is active, Wolf is invulnerable.

ability.name: Violent Tendencies
ability.description: Kled enters combat on Skaarl, granting himself a shield for 80% of his maximum Health. When the shield is broken Kled dismounts, becoming untargetable briefly, and gaining Attack Speed and causing every 4th attack to deal 200% of his Attack Damage.

ability.name: Ethereal Chain
ability.description: LeBlanc launches ethereal chains at the 2 enemies nearest her, dealing magic damage and, after a short delay, stunning them for several seconds.

ability.name: Cripple
ability.description: Lee Sin slams the ground, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing their Attack Speed by 50% for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Solar Barrier
ability.description: Leona creates a barrier around herself, reducing all incoming damage for 4 seconds.

ability.name: 1000 Daggers
ability.description: Lissandra hurls a dagger toward the enemy with the highest Attack Damage, dealing magic damage to the first target it hits. After hitting its initial target or at its final destination, the dagger explodes dealing magic damage to nearby targets. All enemies hit by this spell have their Attack Damage reduced for 8 seconds.

ability.name: Whimsy
ability.description: Lulu enchants the units nearest to her. Enchanted allies gain a percentage bonus Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Enchanted enemies are stunned and transformed into a docile feline for several seconds, taking 20% increased damage. If there are less than 3 units nearby, Lulu will enchant herself.

ability.name: Prismatic Illumination
ability.description: Lux launches her wand toward her farthest ally, then calls the wand back to her hand. The wand shields each ally in its path for 3 seconds. Lux also empowers her next attack to deal an additional amount of magic damage.

ability.name: Infernal Rise
ability.description: Mordekaiser shields himself for 50% of his maximum Health for 5 seconds, empowering his mace to deal bonus magic damage and gain 1 hex of range for the same duration.

ability.name: Soul Shackles
ability.description: Morgana fires chains to nearby enemies, dealing magic magic damage. After 3 seconds, all chained enemies are dealt an additional amount of magic damage and stunned for several seconds.

ability.name: Anchor Slam
ability.description: Nautilus causes the ground beneath his target to erupt, knocking them up, stunning them for several seconds, and dealing magic damage. Enemies adjacent to the target receive 50% of this effect.

ability.name: Aspect of the Cougar
ability.description: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, leaping behind the lowest Health enemy. While in cougar form, Nidalee gains Dodge Chance and her Attack Range is reduced to 1 hex. Whenever she Dodges or critically strikes, her next attack deals bonus magic damage.

ability.name: Umbra Blades
ability.description: Every third attack, Nocturne slashes all adjacent enemies for 125% of his Attack Damage, and heals himself for a percentage of the damage dealt. If only one target is hit, Nocturne increases his Attack Speed by a percentage for 3 seconds.

ability.name: Consume
ability.description: Willump bites his target, dealing magic damage. If Willump's target has less Health than he does before the bite, it deals an additional 50% damage and becomes true damage.

ability.name: Aegis Assault
ability.description: Pantheon braces his shield, reducing all incoming damage for 4 seconds, and dealing a percentage of his Attack Damage in the area in front of him over the duration. Enemies hit have their incoming healing reduced by 50% for 8 seconds.

ability.name: Buckler Toss
ability.description: Poppy throws her buckler at the farthest enemy, dealing magic damage. The buckler then bounces back, granting Poppy a shield that blocks damage.

ability.name: Attract and Repel
ability.description: Rell leaps into the air and creates a tether between herself and her farthest ally. When she lands, the tether breaks, stunning all nearby enemies in its path for several seconds. This effect also grants a Health shield for 4 seconds to nearby allies in the same area.
Riven empowers her blade, stunning nearby enemies for 1.5 seconds and dealing them magic damage. For the next 8 seconds, she gains bonus Attack Damage.
ability.name: Blade of the Dawn
Rune Prison
ability.description: Ryze imprisons the nearest enemy, dealing magic damage and stunning them for several seconds. His next cast spreads from his target, applying the same damage and stun to all enemies in a large area around that target.

ability.name: Fury of the North
ability.description: Sejuani signals Bristle to charge, dealing  magic damage and stunning her target for several seconds. She then gains Frost armour, granting her Armour and Magic Resist for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Haymaker
ability.description: Sett pulls back for a punch, shredding armour for 10 seconds (stacks) and dealing a percentage of his Attack Damage as physical damage to all enemies in the area.

ability.name: Equinox
ability.description: Soraka calms the area around the enemy with the highest current percent Mana, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and increasing the cost of their next Ability by a certain percentage.

ability.name: Force of Will
ability.description: Syndra grabs the nearest enemy and flings them towards the farthest enemy, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies upon impact and stunning the thrown target for several seconds.

ability.name: Nature's Touch
ability.description: All allies in a large area around Taric are healed and gain armour for 5 seconds.

ability.name: Teemo's Cruelty
ability.description: Teemo scatters Infernal Souls around a random enemy. When an enemy nears an Infernal Soul (or after 3 seconds), it explodes dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and reducing their Attack Speed by 50%.

ability.name: Death Sentence
ability.description: Thresh hooks his farthest enemy with his chain scythe, dealing magic damage and pulling them toward himself for several seconds.

ability.name: Subjugate
ability.description: Trundle drains the strength from his current target, stealing a percentage of their Health, armour, Magic Resist, and Attack Damage for 6 seconds.

ability.name: Feral Instinct
ability.description:
Udyr swaps between Turtle and Tiger stance with each cast, gaining the following benefits: 

: Gain a Health shield for 4 seconds.

Tiger: Strike 3 times quickly with his next attack for a percentage of his Attack Damage.

ability.name: Holy Arrows
ability.description: Varus fires a hail of arrows around his target, dealing a percentage of his Attack Damage as physical damage. Varus and allies within the area are blessed, causing them to deal bonus magic damage with their attacks for 6 seconds.

ability.name: Silver Bolts
ability.description: Vayne's third attack on a target deals bonus true damage.

ability.name: Lifeform Disintegration Ray
ability.description: Vel'Koz channels a ray of energy for 3 seconds toward the enemy nearest the center of the battlefield, dealing total magic damage over the duration. The beam widens as Vel'Koz channels, and he will pivot if there are no enemies in the area.

ability.name: Sovereign's Domination
ability.description:
Viego corrupts the soul of his target for 5 seconds, stunning them and dealing magic damage, increasing 100% each second. Viego will be interrupted if he is stunned, and Viego's allies prefer not to target his victim during soul corruption. 

 If his victim dies, they are resurrected at full Health to fight for him, but they lose a percentage of their maximum Health per second. Resurrected enemies receive the Trait bonuses of Viego's team instead of their own.

ability.name: Siphon Power
ability.description: Viktor blasts his target, dealing magic damage to the nearest enemy. He also grants a Health shield to the allies nearest his target for 5 seconds.

ability.name: Transfusion
ability.description: Vladimir deals magic damage to the target and heals for himself.

ability.name: Doombringer
ability.description: Volibear leaps toward his target, then slams the ground in a large area around him. This effect knocks up and stuns enemies for several seconds, removing any shields and dealing magic damage.

ability.name: Infinite Duress
ability.description: Warwick leaps to the enemy with the lowest percent Health, stunning them, dealing magic damage, and healing himself for 80% of the damage over 2 seconds. If this Ability kills the target, Warwick will instantly cast it again.

ability.name: Burning Blade
ability.description: Yasuo strikes his target, dealing magic damage. He then empowers his blade, gaining stacking bonus true damage on-hit for the rest of combat.

ability.name: Arcane Bomb
ability.description: Ziggs throws an arcane bomb at his target, dealing magic damage.

ability.name: Grasping Roots
ability.description: Zyra sends a surge of vines toward her farthest enemy, dealing magic damage and stunning all enemies they hit.

ability.name: Deathbringer Strike
ability.description: Aatrox strikes his target, dealing a percentage of his Attack Damage, and heals himself.

ability.name: Heroic Swing
ability.description:
Passive: Akshan's attacks reduce the target's Armor by 50% for a few seconds.

Active: Akshan launches his grappling hook and swings untargetably toward the farthest enemy, gaining Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Akshan will continue to attack the nearest enemy at double his Attack Speed while swinging.

ability.name: Dark Vigil
ability.description: Aphelios launches attacks simultaneously, one at his target and the rest at the enemies nearest to them, dealing a percentage of his Attack Damage plus bonus physical damage to each.

ability.name: Enchanted Arrow
ability.description: Ashe fires an arrow at the farthest enemy, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and stunning them. If the arrow travels at least 5 hexes, the stun duration is doubled. Enemies within 1 hex receive 50% of these effects.
Brand launches a ball of fire at the nearest non-seared enemy, searing them for magic damage over 12 seconds. Seared enemies have reduced Magic Resist.
ability.name: Sear
Moonfall
ability.description: Diana calls forth moonlight, drawing in all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage and stunning them for several seconds.

ability.name: Spinning Axes
ability.description: Draven starts spinning an axe, empowering his next attack to deal a percentage of his Attack Damage plus @ModifiedDamage@ bonus physical damage. It will return to his original location after striking the target. If Draven catches it, he will empower the axe again. Draven can spin up to 2 axes at a time.

ability.name: Crowstorm
ability.description: After a brief channel, Fiddlesticks teleports behind his target and summons a murder of crows for a while, dealing magic damage per second to all enemies within. Enemies that die within the flock extend its duration by 1 second and heal Fiddlesticks Health.

ability.name: Shield of Durand
ability.description: Galio charges the area around him for 2.5 seconds, taunting all enemies within while gaining Damage Reduction. Upon releasing the charge, Galio deals magic damage to all enemies within 3 hexes and heals for 60% of the damage blocked.

ability.name: God-Lion's Justice
ability.description: Garen calls down a sword that strikes a large area around his target, dealing a percentage of each target's max Health in magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 70% for 10 seconds. Garen gains a shield equal to a percentage of his maximum Health for 5 seconds.

ability.name: Drunken Rage
ability.description: Gragas drinks from his cask, granting him percentage damage reduction for 4 seconds, and causing his next attack to deal bonus magic damage.

ability.name: Skip 'N Slash
ability.description:
Gwen dashes around her target and performs 3 rapid snips in a cone in front of her, each dealing base damage plus % of the target’s maximum Health as magic damage. Snips steal Armor and Magic resist from their target.

Every other cast, Gwen will perform double the amount of snips.

ability.name: Spirit of Dread
ability.description: Hecarim creates an aura around himself for 3 seconds. Each enemy within the aura takes magic damage and heals Hecarim over the duration.

ability.name: Upgrade!!!
ability.description: Heimerdinger empowers his Baby Dragon's next attack. The Baby Dragon's overcharged attack launches 3 fireballs across the battlefield, dealing magic damage and burning enemies for 18% of their maximum Health as true damage over 6 seconds, reducing healing by 50% for the duration. If Heimerdinger does not have a Baby Dragon, this Ability will create one instead.

ability.name: Daisy!
ability.description: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Daisy receives 100% of Ivern's Ability Power and immediately casts Shockwave upon arrival.If Daisy is already in battle, Ivern increases her Ability Power by and commands her to cast Shockwave again.

ability.name: Defiant Dance
ability.description: Irelia surrounds herself with blades for 4 seconds and gains damage reduction, increasing by 10% each time she attacks, up to 80%. When the effect ends she strikes her target as magic damage.

ability.name: Empowered Strike
ability.description: Jax slams his target for a percentage of his Attack Damage and gains stacking Attack Speed for the remainder of combat. Jax leaps to the nearest enemy if no target is in his Attack Range.

ability.name: Pierce
ability.description: Kalista hurls a spear towards the farthest enemy, dealing a percentage of her Attack Damage plus bonus physical damage to the first enemy it hits. If it kills an enemy, the spear continues and will deal any excess damage to the next enemy it hits.

ability.name: Soulflare
ability.description: Karma fires a burst of energy towards a random enemy's location that detonates upon impact, dealing magic damage to adjacent enemies, and reducing Karma's maximum Mana (down to a minimum of 10). Karma empowers every third cast, causing it to launch 3 bursts of energy toward different targets instead of 1.

ability.name: Divine Ascent
ability.description:
Kayle ascends every few seconds. Each bonus stacks with the one before, until she is fully ascended.

 1st: Attacks deal a percentage of Kayle's Attack Damage as bonus true damage.
 2nd: Attacks explode around the target dealing her Attack Damage and bonus true damage to adjacent enemies.
 3rd: Every 7th attack grants Kayle immunity to damage for 1 second.
 4th: Attacks cause swords to rain down around the target, dealing magic damage.

ability.name: Flame Rush
ability.description: Kennen engulfs himself in flame, dashing behind his target, then to the farthest enemy. Enemies he passes through are zapped dealing magic damage and stunning them for several seconds.

ability.name: Taste their Fear
ability.description: Kha'Zix slashes the nearest enemy, dealing magic damage. If the enemy has no adjacent allies, this damage is increased.

ability.name: Violent Tendencies
ability.description: Kled enters combat on Skaarl, granting himself a shield for 80% of his maximum Health. When the shield is broken Kled dismounts, becoming untargetable briefly, and gaining Attack Speed and causing every 4th attack to deal 200% of his Attack Damage.

ability.name: Cripple
ability.description: Lee Sin slams the ground, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing their Attack Speed by 50% for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Solar Barrier
ability.description: Leona creates a barrier around herself, reducing all incoming damage for 4 seconds.

ability.name: The Culling
ability.description: Lucian faces the farthest enemy and fires 16 shots in that direction for 4 seconds, dashing on occasion to keep hitting enemies. Each shot hits for 50% of his Attack Damage and dealing magic damage. Lucian also fires extra shots based on his Attack Speed.

ability.name: Whimsy
ability.description: Lulu enchants the units nearest to her. Enchanted allies gain a percentage bonus Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Enchanted enemies are stunned and transformed into a docile feline for several seconds, taking 20% increased damage. If there are less than 3 units nearby, Lulu will enchant herself.

ability.name: Prismatic Illumination
ability.description: Lux launches her wand toward her farthest ally, then calls the wand back to her hand. The wand shields each ally in its path for 3 seconds. Lux also empowers her next attack to deal an additional amount of magic damage.

ability.name: Make it Rain
ability.description: Miss Fortune rains 4 waves of bullets down around her target, dealing total magic damage to enemies in the area and reducing their incoming healing by 50% for 6 seconds.

ability.name: Anchor Slam
ability.description: Nautilus causes the ground beneath his target to erupt, knocking them up, stunning them for several seconds, and dealing magic damage. Enemies adjacent to the target receive 50% of this effect.

ability.name: Aspect of the Cougar
ability.description: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, leaping behind the lowest Health enemy. While in cougar form, Nidalee gains Dodge Chance and her Attack Range is reduced to 1 hex. Whenever she Dodges or critically strikes, her next attack deals bonus magic damage.

ability.name: Umbra Blades
ability.description: Every third attack, Nocturne slashes all adjacent enemies for 125% of his Attack Damage, and heals himself for a percentage of the damage dealt. If only one target is hit, Nocturne increases his Attack Speed by a percentage for 3 seconds.

ability.name: Consume
ability.description: Willump bites his target, dealing magic damage. If Willump's target has less Health than he does before the bite, it deals an additional 50% damage and becomes true damage.

ability.name: Berserker Rage
ability.description: Olaf gains Attack Speed for each 1% of missing health, and his attacks heal him.

ability.name: Buckler Toss
ability.description: Poppy throws her buckler at the farthest enemy, dealing magic damage. The buckler then bounces back, granting Poppy a shield that blocks damage.

ability.name: Phantom Undertow
ability.description: Pyke leaves a phantom at his location, then dashes behind the farthest enemy. After 1 second, his phantom returns to Pyke, dealing magic damage and stunning all enemies it passes through.

ability.name: Gleaming Quill
ability.description: Rakan launches a feather toward his target, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit. Rakan then heals all nearby allies based on their missing health, with an increased radius if the feather killed an enemy.

ability.name: Attract and Repel
ability.description: Rell leaps into the air and creates a tether between herself and her farthest ally. When she lands, the tether breaks, stunning all nearby enemies in its path for several seconds. This effect also grants a Health shield for 4 seconds to nearby allies in the same area.
Riven empowers her blade, stunning nearby enemies for 1.5 seconds and dealing them magic damage. For the next 8 seconds, she gains bonus Attack Damage.
ability.name: Blade of the Dawn
Fury of the North
ability.description: Sejuani signals Bristle to charge, dealing  magic damage and stunning her target for several seconds. She then gains Frost armour, granting her Armour and Magic Resist for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Last Embrace
ability.description: Senna launches black mist toward the farthest enemy. The first enemy hit along the path is stunned for 1.5 seconds, and all nearby enemies are dealt magic damage.

ability.name: Haymaker
ability.description: Sett pulls back for a punch, shredding armour for 10 seconds (stacks) and dealing a percentage of his Attack Damage as physical damage to all enemies in the area.

ability.description: Soraka calms the area around the enemy with the highest current percent Mana, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and increasing the cost of their next Ability by a certain percentage.

ability.description: Syndra grabs the nearest enemy and flings them towards the farthest enemy, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies upon impact and stunning the thrown target for several seconds.

ability.description: Teemo scatters Infernal Souls around a random enemy. When an enemy nears an Infernal Soul (or after 3 seconds), it explodes dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and reducing their Attack Speed by 50%.

ability.name: Death Sentence
ability.description: Thresh hooks his farthest enemy with his chain scythe, dealing magic damage and pulling them toward himself for several seconds.

ability.name: Rocket Jump
ability.description: Tristana leaps behind the farthest enemy, retargeting to them and gaining Attack Speed for 4 seconds. If there is an enemy adjacent to her, she instead leaps as far away from all enemies as she can.

ability.name: Feral Instinct
ability.description:
Udyr swaps between Turtle and Tiger stance with each cast, gaining the following benefits: 

: Gain a Health shield for 4 seconds.

Tiger: Strike 3 times quickly with his next attack for a percentage of his Attack Damage.

ability.description: Vayne's third attack on a target deals bonus true damage.

ability.description: Vel'Koz channels a ray of energy for 3 seconds toward the enemy nearest the center of the battlefield, dealing total magic damage over the duration. The beam widens as Vel'Koz channels, and he will pivot if there are no enemies in the area.
