Viego corrupts the soul of his target for 5 seconds, stunning them and dealing magic damage, increasing 100% each second. Viego will be interrupted if he is stunned, and Viego's allies prefer not to target his victim during soul corruption. 

 If his victim dies, they are resurrected at full Health to fight for him, but they lose a percentage of their maximum Health per second. Resurrected enemies receive the Trait bonuses of Viego's team instead of their own.

ability.name: Transfusion
ability.description: Vladimir deals magic damage to the target and heals for himself.

ability.name: Doombringer
ability.description: Volibear leaps toward his target, then slams the ground in a large area around him. This effect knocks up and stuns enemies for several seconds, removing any shields and dealing magic damage.

ability.name: Burning Blade
ability.description: Yasuo strikes his target, dealing magic damage. He then empowers his blade, gaining stacking bonus true damage on-hit for the rest of combat.

ability.name: Arcane Bomb
ability.description: Ziggs throws an arcane bomb at his target, dealing magic damage.

ability.name: Grasping Roots
ability.description: Zyra sends a surge of vines toward her farthest enemy, dealing magic damage and stunning all enemies they hit.

ability.name: Perfect Execution
ability.description: Akali dashes in a line through the most enemies, dealing magic damage and marking them for 7 seconds. When a marked target drops below Health threshold, Akali dashes again and executes them, dealing magic damage to enemies she passes through.

ability.name: Rocket Grab
ability.description: Blitzcrank pulls the farthest enemy, dealing magic damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. His next attack after pulling knocks up for 1 second. Allies within range will prefer attacking Blitzcrank's target.

ability.name: Vault Breaker
ability.description: Braum slams his vault door into the ground, creating a fissure towards his target. Enemies within 2 hexes of Braum and those struck by the fissure are stunned for a few seconds and take magic damage.

ability.name: Ace in the Hole
ability.description: Caitlyn takes aim at the farthest enemy, firing a deadly bullet towards them that deals magic damage to the first enemy it hits.

ability.name: Defensive Sweep
ability.description: Camille gains a shield blocking damage over 4 seconds, then sweeps her leg, dealing magic damage to enemies in a cone. While this shield holds, Camille's attacks restore Health.

ability.name: Feast
ability.description: Cho'Gath devours the lowest Health enemy within range, dealing magic damage. If this kills the target, Cho’Gath gains a stack of Feast, up to max stacks. Each stack of Feast permanently grants 2% bonus Health and size.

ability.name: Decimate
ability.description: Darius swings his axe in a circle, dealing magic damage, then heals himself Health for each enemy hit.

ability.name: Zap Dose
ability.description: Dr. Mundo injects himself with “medicine”, restoring 35% of his maximum Health and becoming energized for 5 seconds. While energized, he restores an additional 100% of his maximum Health over the duration and deals magic damage to a random nearby enemy each second. When the "medicine" expires, Dr. Mundo expels a burst of electricity that deals % of his current Health as magic damage to all enemies within 2 hexes.

ability.name: Parallel Convergence
ability.description: Ekko invokes an afterimage that bats a device towards the largest group of units. Upon landing, it deals magic damage to enemies within and applies reduced Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Allies inside gain Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Mystic Shot
ability.description: Ezreal fires a missile at his target, dealing 150% of his Attack Damage plus bonus physical damage. If the missile hits, he grants himself 20% bonus stacking Attack Speed, up to 125% at 5 stacks.

ability.name: Blade Waltz
ability.description:
Fiora becomes untargetable and strikes 4 times at her target's vitals. Each strike deals 170% of her Attack Damage as physical damage, bonus true damage, and heals her for 20% of the total damage dealt.

If the target dies, Fiora will change targets to the nearest enemy.

ability.name: Colossal Entrance
ability.description:
Galio becomes invulnerable and leaps into the sky before crashing down on the largest group of enemies. Enemies within a large radius take magic damage and are knocked into the sky. The lower the enemy's maximum Health is compared to Galio's, the further they are knocked up.

Passive: Galio’s Critical Strikes slam the ground, dealing bonus magic damage to enemies around his target.

ability.name: Parrrley
ability.description: Gangplank attacks his target with his gun, dealing 170% of his Attack Damage plus bonus physical damage. If this attack kills a champion, Gangplank plunders 1 gold

ability.name: Decisive Strike
ability.description: Garen shrugs off all crowd control effects, empowering his next strike to deal 200% of his Attack Damage, plus an additional % of his missing Health in bonus physical damage. This ability can be cast while stunned.

ability.name: Smoke Grenade
ability.description: Graves launches a smoke grenade toward this current target. The grenade explodes on impact dealing magic damage to nearby enemies, and Disarms enemies who remain within the smoke cloud for a few seconds.

ability.name: Rocket Swarm
ability.description: Heimerdinger fires a waves of 5 rockets that converge on his target, each dealing magic damage to the first target they hit. Every 3rd cast, Heimerdinger summons 3 waves instead.

ability.name: Harsh Lesson
ability.description: Illaoi slams her target, linking her soul to it for 5 seconds and dealing magic damage. While linked, Illaoi is healed for % of the damage taken by her target.

ability.name: Monsoon
ability.description: Janna summons a Monsoon, knocking back nearby enemies and stunning them. The Monsoon heals your team over 3 seconds.

ability.name: Mercury Cannon/Mercury Hammer
ability.description:
Melee form: Jayce overcharges himself, becoming unstoppable and gaining a shield for 3 seconds. Jayce then attacks twice, cleaving enemies in front of him for % of his Attack Damage as physical damage before leaping to the skies and slamming down on his target. Enemies within 2 hexes take the same damage and suffer a % reduction in Armor and Magic Resist for 5 seconds.
Passive: Jayce gain 40 Armor and Magic Resist.

Ranged form: Jayce summons an acceleration gate, granting allies within the same row % Attack Speed for 5 seconds. He then replaces his next 3 attacks with orbs of electricity that deal % of his Attack Damage as physical damage in an area around his target. The 3rd orb has an increased area of effect.
Passive: Jayce's range is increased by 4 hexes and he gains Attack Damage.

ability.name: Curtain Call
ability.description:
Jhin transforms his weapon into a powerful sniper rifle for his next 4 shots. Each shot deals % of his Attack Damage as physical damage, reduced by 50% for each target it pierces through. The 4th shot is guaranteed to critically strike, and deals 100% more damage based on his target's missing Health.

Passive: Jhin always attacks fixed times per second. He converts each 1% of bonus Attack Speed into 0.8 Attack Damage.

ability.name: Super Mega Death Rocket
ability.description:
Jinx rides her rocket into the sky, then comes crashing down near the center-most enemy, dealing magic damage to enemies around the epicenter, and 50% to all other enemies in in a large area. The epicenter burns every unit except Jinx for 5 seconds, dealing % of the target's maximum Health as true damage, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration.

She then swaps to her rocket launcher for the rest of combat, causing her attacks to explode for % of her Attack Damage in a small area around her target.

ability.name: Icathian Monsoon
ability.description:
Kai’sa dashes away from all enemies, then fires a volley of missiles spread evenly among all enemies that deal magic damage each.

For each time Kai'Sa has attacked this combat, she'll fire an additional missile.

ability.name: Null Sphere
ability.description: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at his target, dealing magic damage and granting Kassadin a shield that reduces incoming damage by 25% for 5 seconds. Enemies hit by the orb suffer a increased Mana cost for their next Ability cast.

ability.name: Shunpo
ability.description: Katarina blinks behind the enemy with the lowest Health within 3 hexes and slashes all adjacent enemies, dealing magic damage. Katarina gains Mana for each enemy killed by Shunpo.

ability.name: Barrage
ability.description: For 3 seconds, Kog’Maw gains infinite Attack Range, 75% Attack Speed, and his attacks deal % of the target's maximum Health as bonus magic damage.

ability.name: Solar Eclipse
ability.description: Leona calls down a beacon of light upon herself, granting herself a Health shield for a few seconds. Leona and all allies within 2 hexes gain Armor and Magic Resistance for the same duration.

ability.name: Iron Maiden
ability.description:
Lissandra encases her target in an iron maiden, stunning them for 1.5 seconds and dealing magic damage to enemies within a large area. Damage from the iron maiden reduces enemies' Attack Damage by 30% for 4 seconds

If Lissandra is below 50% Health, she encases herself instead, dealing damage to surrounding enemies and becoming untargetable and invulnerable for 2 seconds.

ability.name: Wild Growth
ability.description: Lulu enlarges low Health allies, granting them bonus Health and knocking up enemies near them. If the ally is already enlarged, they are healed instead.

ability.name: Final Spark
ability.description: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam towards the farthest enemy target, dealing magic damage. If she kills a unit with her beam, she gains 20 mana.

ability.name: Malefic Visions
ability.description:
Malzahar infects the mind of the closest unafflicted target, dealing magic damage over 8 seconds and reducing the Magic Resist of enemies by 40%.

If an afflicted target dies, Malefic Visions spreads to the nearest unafflicted targets with the remaining duration.

ability.name: Make it Rain
ability.description: Miss Fortune rains 4 waves of bullets down around her target, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area and reducing their incoming healing by 50% for 6 seconds.

ability.name: Command: Shockwave
ability.description: Orianna sends out her ball towards the largest group of champions, then commands it to release a shockwave. Allies within 2 hexes gain shield for 4 seconds, while enemies within the area are briefly knocked up and dealt magic damage. Enemies adjacent to the ball are drawn in and stunned.

ability.name: Buckler Toss
ability.description: Poppy throws her buckler at the farthest enemy, dealing % of her Armor as magic damage. The buckler then bounces back, granting Poppy a shield that blocks damage.

ability.name: Disarming Assault
ability.description: Quinn sends Valor out at the target with the highest Attack Speed, dealing magic damage to the target and nearby enemies. All targets are disarmed for 2 / 2.5 / 3 seconds.

ability.name: Flair
ability.description:
If a target is adjacent to Samira, she slashes with her blade in a cone towards them dealing % of her Attack Damage as physical damage to all enemies within and reducing their Armor. This Armor reduction can stack.

Otherwise, she fires an empowered shot at her target with the same effects and gain 20 Mana.

ability.name: Encore
ability.description: Seraphine projects her song towards the largest group of units. The song deals magic damage to enemies. Allies it passes through are healed Health and gain Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Decieve
ability.description: Shaco dips into the shadows, briefly becoming untargetable. His next attack instead deals % of his Attack Damage plus bonus damage as physical damage, and is guaranteed to critically strike targets below 50% Health.

ability.name: Fling
ability.description: Singed flings a nearby enemy towards the largest cluster of enemies, stunning his target for a few seconds when they land. All adjacent enemies take magic damage and are briefly stunned.

ability.name: Decimating Smash
ability.description: Sion winds up for a moment, then smashes his axe down. All enemies within a large area are knocked up, stunned for a few seconds, and dealt magic damage.

ability.name: Death's Hand
ability.description: Swain unleashes piercing bolts of eldritch power in a cone towards his target, dealing magic damage to enemies within and healing Swain for each enemy hit.

ability.name: Devour
ability.description:
Tahm Kench devours his target, storing them in his belly and dealing magic damage damage over 3 seconds. During this time, they are invulnerable to other sources of damage and Tahm Kench takes 30% less damage.

If they die while inside, Tahm Kench either spits out a random item component they were holding, or the cost of the unit in gold. Otherwise, he spits them towards the farthest enemy, briefly stunning targets they impact.

If a target is immune to crowd control. Tahm Kench will instead deal 35% of magic damage.

ability.name: Blade's End
ability.description: Passive: Talon's first attack on an enemy causes them to bleed for magic damage over 7 seconds. Every 3rd attack on a target applies an additional bleed.

ability.name: Starlight Bastion
ability.description: Taric heals himself and the lowest % Health ally. Any overhealing is converted to a shield that lasts 4 seconds.

ability.name: Buster Shot
ability.description: Tristana fires a massive cannonball towards her target, dealing % of her Attack Damage plus physical damage to the first enemy it hits. If the target is within 2 hexes of Tristana, they're knocked back some hexes and briefly stunned.

ability.name: Chomp
ability.description: Trundle bites his target dealing 140% of his Attack Damage, and reducing the target's Attack Speed by 25% for 3 seconds. Each bite also steals Attack Damage for the rest of combat.

ability.name: Wild Cards
ability.description: Twisted Fate throws 3 cards in a cone that deal magic damage to each enemy they pass through.

ability.name: Piercing Bolt
ability.description: Twitch fires a powerful bolt towards his target that pierces through enemies, dealing % of his Attack Damage plus bonus physical damage and reduces healing by 50% for 5 seconds.

ability.name: Purge
ability.description: For the next several seconds, Urgot attacks the closest enemy at a fixed rate of attacks per second. Each attack deals physical damage. (This Ability's damage scales with Attack Damage and Attack Speed.)

ability.name: Furyhorn Storm
ability.description: Veigar calls down Furyhorns over a few seconds near random enemies, each dealing magic damage.

ability.name: Personal Space
ability.description:
Vex shields herself against damage over 4 seconds. When the shield expires, it deals magic damage to all enemies within 2 hexes, and an additional
damage if it wasn't destroyed.

If it was destroyed, Personal Space becomes 15% stronger this combat. This effect can stack.

ability.name: Denting Blow
ability.description: Vi empowers her next attack to blast through her target, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a cone and reducing their Armor for 8 seconds.

ability.name: Death Rays
ability.description: Viktor summons multiple singularities to fire death rays that cut across the battlefield in a line and melt enemy defenses. To enemies caught in its path, death rays deal magic damage, destroy % of any remaining shields, and reduce Armor for 6 seconds.

ability.name: Eternal Hunger
ability.description: Passive: Warwick's Attacks deal an additional % of his target's current Health as bonus magic damage, and heal him.

ability.name: Soul Unbound
ability.description:
Yone summons his spirit to attack an enemy up to 3 hexes away for a few seconds. The spirit is an untargetable, invulnerable copy of Yone and heals him for % of the damage it deals.

If Yone dies, his spirit dies with him.

ability.name: Final Chapter
ability.description: Yuumi and Book detach and then launch waves toward the farthest enemy, each dealing magic damage and stunning enemies for 1 seconds. She then attaches to the nearest ally.

ability.name: Yoink!
ability.description: Zac stretches his arms up to 3 hexes to pull the 2 most distant enemies towards him, dealing magic damage.

ability.name: Mini Inferno Bomb
ability.description: Ziggs hurls a bomb at his target. After a moderate delay, the bomb lands dealing magic damage to the enemy in the epicenter, and 50% to adjacent enemies.

ability.name: Time Bomb
ability.description: Zilean places a bomb on the closest enemy, stunning them. When the stun ends, or the target dies, the bomb explodes dealing magic damage to adjacent enemies and reducing their Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Grasping Spines
ability.description: Zyra summons vines in the row with the most enemies, dealing magic damage and stunning them.

ability.name: Orb of Deception
ability.description: Ahri fires an orb in a line, dealing magic damage to all enemies it passes through on the way out and the way back. Ahri fires additional orbs for each time she has cast this combat.

ability.name: Pulverize
ability.description: Alistar charges at his target, knocking them back for a short distance. Then he slams the ground, dealing magic damage and stunning all nearby enemies for a few seconds.

ability.name: Volley
ability.description: Ashe fires a volley of arrows centered on her target, dealing % of her Attack Damage as physical damage per arrow and slowing their Attack Speed by 15% for 3 seconds.

ability.name: Rocket Grab
ability.description: Blitzcrank pulls the farthest enemy, dealing magic damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. His next attack knocks up for 1 second. Allies within range will prefer attacking Blitzcrank's target.

ability.name: Sear
ability.description:
Brand launches a fireball at the nearest enemy, lighting them ablaze for 4 seconds and dealing magic damage. If the enemy is already on fire, they take bonus magic damage which stuns them for a few seconds.

VIP Bonus: Brand fires a 2nd fireball at a different nearby target (prioritises ablaze enemies) dealing 30% reduced damage.

ability.name: Vault Breaker
ability.description: Braum slams his vault door into the ground, creating a fissure towards his target. Enemies within 2 hexes of Braum and those struck by the fissure, are stunned for a few seconds and take magic damage.

ability.name: Ace in the Hole
ability.description: Caitlyn takes aim at the farthest enemy, firing a deadly bullet towards them that deals magic damage to the first enemy it hits.

ability.name: Defensive Sweep
ability.description: Camille gains a shield blocking damage over 4 seconds, then sweeps her leg, dealing magic damage to enemies in a cone. While this shield holds, Camille's attacks restore Health.

ability.name: Feast
ability.description: Cho’Gath devours the lowest Health enemy within range, dealing magic damage. If this kills the target, Cho’Gath gains a stack of Feast, up to max stacks. Each stack of Feast permanently grants 2% bonus Health and size.

ability.name: Bombardment
ability.description: Corki fires a missile at his target that explodes on impact, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

ability.name: Decimate
ability.description: Darius swings his axe in a circle, dealing magic damage, then heals himself Health for each enemy hit.

ability.name: Spinning Axes
ability.description:
Draven starts spinning an axe, empowering his next attack to deal % of his Attack Damage plus bonus physical damage. It will return to his original location after striking the target. If Draven catches it, he will empower the axe again. Draven can spin up to 2 axes at a time.

VIP Bonus: Draven gains infinite attack range and ignores 50% his target's Armor.

ability.name: Parallel Convergence
ability.description: Ekko invokes an afterimage that bats a device towards the largest group of units. Upon landing, it deals magic damage to enemies within and applies reduced Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Allies inside gain Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Mystic Shot
ability.description: Ezreal fires a missile at his target, dealing 150% of his Attack Damage plus bonus physical damage. If the missile hits, he grants himself 20% bonus stacking Attack Speed, up to 100% at 5 stacks.

ability.name: Colossal Entrance
ability.description:
Galio becomes invulnerable and leaps into the sky before crashing down on the largest group of enemies. Enemies within a large radius take magic damage and are knocked up.

Passive: Galio's Critical Strikes slam the ground, dealing bonus magic damage to enemies around his target.

ability.name: Parrrley
ability.description: Gangplank attacks his target with his gun, dealing 170% of his Attack Damage plus bonus physical damage. If this attack kills a champion, Gangplank plunders 1 gold.

ability.name: GNAR!
ability.description:
Gnar transforms into Mega Gnar for the rest of combat. Mega Gnar throws a boulder at the farthest enemy within boulder range, dealing % of his Attack Damage plus bonus damage as physical damage to all enemies it passes through.

While in Mega Gnar form. Gnar is melee, gains Health, and his mana costs are reduced by 20.

ability.name: Harsh Lesson
ability.description: Illaoi slams her target, linking her soul to it for 5 seconds and dealing magic damage. While linked, Illaoi is healed for % of the damage taken by her target.

ability.name: Bladesurge
ability.description: Irelia dashes to her target, striking them for physical damage. If this kills the target, she Bladesurges again at the lowest Health enemy.

ability.name: Ageless Standard
ability.description: Jarvan calls down his standard to a nearby location, granting all nearby allies Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

ability.name: Mercury Cannon/Mercury Hammer
ability.description:
Melee form: Jayce overcharges himself, becoming unstoppable and gaining a shield for 3 seconds. Jayce then attacks twice, cleaving enemies in front of him for % of his Attack Damage as physical damage before leaping to the skies and slamming down on his target. Enemies within 2 hexes take the same damage and suffer a % reduction in Armor and Magic Resist for 5 seconds.

Passive: Jayce gain 40 Armor and Magic Resist.

Ranged form: Jayce summons an acceleration gate, granting allies within the same row % Attack Speed for 5 seconds. He then replaces his next 3 attacks with orbs of electricity that deal % of his Attack Damage as physical damage in an area around his target. The 3rd orb has an increased area of effect.

Passive: Jayce's range is increased by 4 hexes and he gains Attack Damage.

ability.name: Curtain Call
ability.description:
Jhin transforms his weapon into a powerful sniper rifle for his next 4 shots. Each shot deals % of his Attack Damage as physical damage, reduced by 33% for each target it pierces through. The 4th shot is guaranteed to critically strike, and deals 100% more damage based on his target's missing Health.

Passive: Jhin always attacks fixed times per second. He converts each 1% of bonus Attack Speed into 0.8 Attack Damage.

ability.name: Super Mega Death Rocket
ability.description:
Jinx rides her rocket into the sky, then comes crashing down near the center-most enemy, dealing magic damage to enemies around the epicenter, and 50% to all other enemies in in a large area. The epicenter burns every unit except Jinx for 5 seconds, dealing % of the target's maximum Health as true damage, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration.

She then swaps to her rocket launcher and targets random units for the rest of combat. Her attacks now explode for % of her Attack Damage in a small area around her target.

ability.name: Icathian Monsoon
ability.description:
Kai’sa dashes away from all enemies, then fires a volley of missiles spread evenly among all enemies that deal magic damage each.

For each time Kai'Sa has attacked this combat, she'll fire an additional missile.

ability.name: Null Sphere
ability.description: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at his target, dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by the orb suffer a 50% increased Mana cost for their next Ability cast. Kassadin also grants himself a shield that reduces incoming damage by 25% for 5 seconds.

ability.name: Arid Assault
ability.description: Kha'Zix leaps towards the lowest Health enemy. striking them for physical damage and increasing their maximum Mana by 50% until they cast.

ability.name: Solar Eclipse
ability.description:
Leona calls down a beacon of light upon herself, granting herself a Health shield for a few seconds. Leona and allies within 2 hexes gain Armor and Magic Resistance for the same duration.

VIP Bonus: Every second, Leona heals herself for 0.8% of max HP each unit targeting her.

ability.name: Relentless Pursuit
ability.description: Lucian dashes away from his current target and fires shots at nearby enemies that each deal magic damage.

ability.name: Wild Growth
ability.description: Lulu enlarges low Health allies, granting them bonus Health and knocking up enemies near them. If the ally is already enlarged, they are healed instead.

ability.name: Malefic Visions
ability.description:
Malzahar infects the mind of the closest unafflicted target, dealing magic damage over 8 seconds and reducing the Magic Resist of enemies by 40%.

If an afflicted target dies, Malefic Visions spreads to the nearest unafflicted targets with the remaining duration.

ability.name: Make it Rain
ability.description: Miss Fortune rains 4 waves of bullets down around her target, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area and reducing their incoming healing by 50% for 6 seconds.

ability.name: Soul Shackles
ability.description:
Morgana grant herself a shield for 3 seconds and shackles herself to all enemies in a 2 hex radius. She then deals magic damage per second to them, as long as the shield holds.

If the shield expires without being broken, all targets are stunned for a few seconds. If the shield is broken, Morgana instead refunds herself 30 mana.

ability.name: Unspeakable Horror
ability.description: Nocturne terrifies his target, stunning them with fear for a few seconds and dealing magic damage over the duration.

ability.name: Command: Shockwave
ability.description: Orianna sends out her ball towards the largest group of champions, then commands it to release a shockwave. Allies within 2 hexes gain shield for 4 seconds, while enemies within the area are briefly knocked up and dealt magic damage. Enemies adjacent to the ball are drawn in and stunned.

ability.name: Buckler Toss
ability.description: Poppy throws her buckler at the farthest enemy, dealing % of her Armor as magic damage. The buckler then bounces back, granting Poppy a shield that blocks damage.

ability.name: Disarming Assault
ability.description: Quinn sends Valor out at the target with the highest Attack Speed, dealing magic damage to the target and nearby enemies. All targets are disarmed for a few seconds.

ability.name: Furious Bite
ability.description: Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing 125% of her Attack Damage plus bonus damage, stealing % of her target's Armor and Magic Resist, and healing herself.

ability.name: Toxic Wave
ability.description: Renata unleashes a toxic poison wave towards the largest group of nearby enemies, poisoning all enemies caught in its path for 15 seconds. Poisoned enemies suffer 25% reduced Attack Speed and take magic damage per second. Damage dealt by the poison can stack.

ability.name: Arcane Assault
ability.description: Sejuani signals Bristle to charge, dealing magic damage and stunning her target for a few seconds. She then gains Frost Armor, granting her Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Piercing Darkness
ability.description: Senna fires a beam in the direction of her target, dealing 160% of her Attack Damage plus base damage as physical damage to all enemies hit. For each enemy hit, she heals the lowest health ally for 50% of the damage dealt.

ability.name: Encore
ability.description: Seraphine projects her song towards the largest group of unit, dealing magic damage to enemies. Allies it passes through are healed Health and gain Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Unstable Concoction
ability.description: Silco injects an unstable concoction into some of his lowest Health allies, granting them maximum Health, Attack Speed, and immunity to crowd control for 8 seconds. When the concoction wears off, unstable units die by explosion, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

ability.name: Fling
ability.description: Singed flings a nearby enemy towards the largest cluster of enemies, stunning his target for a few seconds when they land. All adjacent enemies take magic damage and are briefly stunned.

ability.name: On the Hunt
ability.description: For the next 5 seconds, Sivir grants herself bonus % Attack Speed and her attack bounce up to several times dealing 33% of her Attack Damage to enemies hit.

ability.name: Death's Hand
ability.description: Swain unleashes piercing bolts of eldritch power in a cone towards his target, dealing magic damage to enemies within and healing Swain for each enemy hit.

ability.name: Force of Will
ability.description:
Syndra flings the nearest enemy towards the farthest enemy, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies upon impact and stunning the thrown target for a few seconds.

VIP Bonus: Force of Will's impact area is larger and knocks up affected enemies for 1.5 seconds.

ability.name: Devour
ability.description:
Tahm Kench devours his target, storing them in his belly and dealing magic damage damage over 3 seconds. During this time, they are invulnerable to other sources of damage and Tahm Kench takes 30% less damage.

If they die while inside, Tahm Kench either spits out a random item component they were holding, or the cost of the unit in gold. Otherwise, he spits them towards the farthest enemy, briefly stunning targets on impact.

If a target is immune to crowd control. Tahm Kench will instead deal 33% of magic damage.

ability.name: Blade's End
ability.description:
Passive: Talon's first attack on an enemy causes them to bleed for magic damage over 7 seconds. Every 3rd attack on a target applies an additional bleed.

VIP Bonus: Talon's bleed now deals true damage and lasts 100% longer.

ability.name: Spinning Slash
ability.description: Tryndamere spins in a line towards the most enemies, dealing physical damage to enemies in his path and empowering his next 3 attacks to deal 20% more damage.

ability.name: Piercing Bolt
ability.description: Twitch fires a powerful bolt towards his target that pierces through enemies, dealing % of his Attack Damage plus bonus physical damage and reduces healing by 50% for 5 seconds.

ability.name: Furyhorn Storm
ability.description: Veigar calls down Furyhorns over a few seconds near random enemies, each dealing magic damage.

ability.name: Personal Space
ability.description:
Vex shields herself against damage over 4 seconds. When the shield expires, it deals magic damage to all enemies within 2 hexes, and a additional damage if it wasn't destroyed.

If it was destroyed, Personal Space becomes 15% stronger this combat. This effect can stack.

ability.name: Piltover Pulverizer
ability.description:
Vi shield herself and deals magic damage to that enemy and enemies behind it.

On her 2nd cast, she also dashes through her target.

On her 3rd cast, she instead throws her target into the air and slams them back to the ground, dealing in a circle around her target.

ability.name: Death Rays
ability.description:
Passive: Viktor's attacks melt his target's defenses, reducing their Armor by 70% for 6 seconds.

Viktor summons multiple singularities that fire death rays, which cut across the battlefield in a line. To enemies caught in its path, death rays deal magic damage, destroy % of any remaining shields.

ability.name: Eternal Hunger
ability.description: Passive: Warwick's Attacks deal an additional % of his target's current Health as bonus magic damage, and heal him.

ability.name: Yoink!
ability.description: Zac stretches his arms up to 3 hexes to pull the 2 most distant enemies towards him, dealing magic damage. During this time, Zac gains 75% damage reduction.

ability.name: Lightning Crash
ability.description:
Zeri charges herself up with electricity for 6 seconds. While electrified, she aims at the farthest enemy, her attacks pierce, and she dashes after every shot.

Passive: Zeri's Basic Attacks fire bullets, each dealing 18% of her Attack Damage as physical damage plus bonus magic damage.

VIP Bonus: Zeri's electrified duration lasts until the end of combat.

ability.name: Mini Inferno Bomb
ability.description: Ziggs hurls a bomb at his target. After a moderate delay, the bomb lands dealing magic damage to the enemy in the epicenter, and 50% to adjacent enemies.

ability.name: Time Bomb
ability.description: Zilean places a bomb on the closest enemy, stunning them. When the stun ends or the target dies, the bomb explodes, dealing magic damage to adjacent enemies and reducing their Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Grasping Spines
ability.description: Zyra summons vines in the row with the most enemies, dealing magic damage and stunning them.
